title: Catastrophe claims batch reports
dataVerified: Insurer, catastrophe code, affected policies, claim counts, estimated losses
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fraudulent catastrophe claims (claiming damage from wrong event). Domain binding verifies insurer. Regulatory reporting (state insurance departments). ISO catastrophe codes. Large-scale disaster response. Prevents false CAT claim inflation.
